(no-effect-on-undead [undeadimmune])
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], Internal Damage [internal], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 60D to forge (D6)

This gruesome blade was designed by Vestur of the Black Coven. The dark powers of the sword consumed its maker when he first used it in battle. The sword's powers were tamed when Vestur returned from beyond the grave. The black blade is covered with runes of death and destruction, and was tempered in the essence of dying souls. Only the undead are safe from the destructive powers of the sword.
